page.title: 06School community activities
page.content: The education of the children within the school aims to give the child an understanding of the community in which it lives. School functions are therefore greatly linked with village life. The children celebrate religious festivals Harvest Christmas and Easter in one of the local churches. Older members of the population are encouraged to visit the school for seasonal entertainment. The children also take part in a wide range of other events such as the annual Gritworth Fayre _ when a team of older children take part in competitive races with children from other village schools.The school also organises its own events through a Parent Teacher Association which holds monthly Whist Drives, Bazaars and Jumble Sales.
